version_description: Fixes a problem with the update to version 2.0 that affects some users.

New Features:
- Offline soft token identity activation by scanning a QR code.
- Offline transaction confirmation by scanning a QR code.
- Detect when the local device time is out of sync with the server time.
- Support for Touch ID authentication.
- Support for iPhone 6 and iPhone 6 Plus screen sizes.

Maintenance:
- Various bug fixes.
- Removed support for SSL 3.0.

New Features:
- Support for mobile security profile.

Maintenance:
- Various bug fixes.

Enhancements:
- Disable fallback to device passcode when performing Touch ID authentication.
- Disable Touch ID if the user makes changes to enrolled fingerprints on the device.

Fixes:
- Adjusted the time synchronization detection to avoid false positives.
- Fixed issue where PIN keyboard was not displaying.
- Allow QR code activation to proceed when identity provider does not support online registration.
- Added a link to the privacy policy in the help page.
- Other bugs fixes.
Fixed an issue with PIN validation.

Enhancements:
- Translations for German and Japanese language support.

Fixes:
- Other bugs fixes.
Fixed an issue with Touch ID in iOS 11.

New in this release:
-Ability to unlock the application using facial recognition.
Fixes:
-Various bug fixes.
Support for queued transactions and minor bug fixes.
Fixed the face registration tutorial video.
Support for queued transactions and minor bug fixes.

• Support for seamless tokens migration to new provider
• Various minor bug fixes

• Support for iOS 13
• Minor bug fixes
Minor bug fixes

Add support for iOS14
Minor bug fixes
Minor bug fixes
